page.title: 05 TRANSPORT IN PEEBLES
page.content: Area served by Eastern Scottish Bus Co. Main services 1) Edinburgh- {Peebles}-Galashiels-Melrose. 2) {Peebles-}Broughton-Biggar. 3) {Peebles}-West Linton -Carlops. Plus local services. There are 3 taxi firms-D.S, Status & Smiths. { The Peebles Railway was closed on Monday 5 Feb. 1962. Most people have cars:3,500 tax discs for private vehicles issued by local post office in 1984 (but some for part year).Main car dealers are Tweeddale (Leyland),Harrisons (Ford),Clelands (Vauxhall). Mr Cleland states the total sales of new cars in Peebles, Innerleithen West Linton & Broughton area was 741; Cleland's sold 225 new & 290 used cars.This was for 1984.
